name: dateConvert
description: Converts local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), or UTC to local time. The function uses the daylight savings settings in the executing computer to compute daylight savings time, if required.

params.name: conversionType
params.description:
`local2Utc` : Converts local time to UTC time.
`utc2Local` : Converts UTC time to local time.

coldfusion.notes: Member function is available in CF11+.

examples.title: Converting UTC to Local
examples.description: This example makes sense only if your server time is UTC. now() uses your server settings when creating a datetime object.
